title: Impact of Corporate Earnings Reports on International Paper Co stock's price movements

content.text: On July 29, 2021, International Paper Co released its Q2 2021 earnings report. The company reported adjusted earnings per share (EPS) of $1.13, beating analysts' expectations of $1.06. Additionally, their revenue for the quarter was $5.5 billion, surpassing the estimated $5.4 billion. As a result of the positive earnings report, the stock price of International Paper Co increased by 4.5% on the day following the report.

On April 29, 2021, International Paper Co published its Q1 2021 earnings report. The company reported adjusted EPS of $0.81, which exceeded analysts' estimates of $0.51. However, the revenue of $5.6 billion fell short of the expected $5.67 billion. The mixed earnings report led to a minor decline in the stock price of International Paper Co, dropping by 1.2% on the day after the report.

International Paper Co released its Q4 2020 earnings report on January 28, 2021. The company reported adjusted EPS of $1.29, surpassing analysts' expectations of $1.24. Furthermore, its revenue for the quarter was $5.5 billion, exceeding the anticipated $5.45 billion. The positive earnings report resulted in a significant increase in the stock price of International Paper Co, rising by 8.9% on the day following the report.

On October 29, 2020, International Paper Co announced its Q3 2020 earnings report. The company reported adjusted EPS of $0.85, surpassing analysts' estimates of $0.69. Additionally, the revenue for the quarter was $5.1 billion, slightly exceeding the expected $5.07 billion. The positive earnings report led to a notable increase in the stock price of International Paper Co, rising by 5.2% on the day following the report.

International Paper Co released its Q2 2020 earnings report on July 30, 2020. The company reported adjusted EPS of $0.57, which exceeded analysts' expectations of $0.48. However, the revenue of $4.9 billion fell short of the estimated $5.11 billion. The mixed earnings report resulted in a minor decline in the stock price of International Paper Co, dropping by 0.8% on the day after the report.

On April 30, 2020, International Paper Co published its Q1 2020 earnings report. The company reported adjusted EPS of $0.57, matching analysts' estimates. However, the revenue of $5.2 billion fell short of the expected $5.26 billion. The mixed earnings report led to a minimal change in the stock price of International Paper Co, with a slight decline of 0.2% on the day following the report.

International Paper Co announced its Q4 2019 earnings report on January 30, 2020. The company reported adjusted EPS of $1.09, exceeding analysts' expectations of $1.07. Furthermore, its revenue for the quarter was $5.5 billion, matching the estimated $5.5 billion. The positive earnings report resulted in a moderate increase in the stock price of International Paper Co, rising by 2.3% on the day following the report.

On October 24, 2019, International Paper Co released its Q3 2019 earnings report. The company reported adjusted EPS of $1.09, surpassing analysts' estimates of $1.08. Additionally, the revenue for the quarter was $5.6 billion, matching the expected $5.6 billion. The positive earnings report led to a slight increase in the stock price of International Paper Co, rising by 0.6% on the day following the report.

news.headline: International Paper Declares Quarterly Dividend
news.summary: International Paper (NYSE: IP) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.4625 per share for the period from July 1, 2024 to September 30, 2024, inclusive, on the common stock, par value $1.00, of the Company, payable on September 16, 2024 to holders of record at the close of business on August 15, 2024.
